Observed at: Claresholm 5:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 39 %
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: WSW 34 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 in wind prone areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
